faqs.q: How many calories in a New York strip steak?
faqs.a: About 461 kcal for a standard 6 oz cooked serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein in New York strip?
faqs.a: Approximately 43 g protein per 6 oz steak.

faqs.q: Does New York strip have carbs?

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in New York strip?
faqs.a: Broiling or grilling keeps calories lower; pan-frying with oil adds 50-100 kcal per tbsp.

faqs.q: Is New York strip high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~31 g total fat per 6 oz, with 13 g saturated; choose lean cuts to reduce.
